description: This holds the various discoveries an agent finds, such as genAI processes, applications and plugins.

ID.description: ID is the identifier of the object.
ID.title: ID

OS.description: The operating system the application is running on.
OS.title: OS

hostname.description: The hostname where the discovery took place.
hostname.title: hostname

importHash.description: The hash of the structure used to compare with new import version.
importHash.title: importHash

importLabel.description: The user-defined import label that allows the system to group resources from the same import operation.
importLabel.title: importLabel

installedApps.description: List of installed applications found based on the list set in agent config.
installedApps.title: installedApps

runningProcesses.description: The list of running processes found based on the list set in agent config.
runningProcesses.title: runningProcesses

username.description: The username that owns the processes and applications.
username.title: username

title: AgentDiscovery
